nickname.header: Defina seu nickname antes de acessar o bate papo.

2kki.hostedWithPermission: Hospedados com a permissão dos desenvolvedores de Yume 2kki

messages.leavePage: Tem certesa que quer sair da página? Qualquer progresso não salvo será perdido.

common.failedSlotInput: O slot fornecido não é válido: por favor insira um número de slot do arquivo salvo entre 1 e 15.

upload.slotInput: Insira o número de slot do arquivo salvo para enviar (1 á 15).
upload.invalidSaveFile: Por favor selecione um arquivo salvo válido (formato: .lsd).

download.slotInput: Insira o número de slot do arquivo salvo para baixar (1 á 15).
download.emptySlot: Ué? Parece que o arquivo salvo do slot fornecido está vazio.

tips.menuTheme: Your name color and your player list entry style are based on your in-game menu theme.
tips.playersInMap: You can switch between the number of players online and the number of players in your map by clicking the label.
tips.globalChatLocation: You can view the location a global chat message was sent in by hovering over or clicking the globe icon to the left of the message. It will also show or hide future global chat message locations based on your last show or hide.
tips.markdownSupport: Chat supports text formatting by wrapping text in certain characters. Currently supported are: **bold** (\*\*text\*\*), *italic* (\*text\*, \_text\_), __underline__ (\_\_text\_\_), and ~~strikethrough~~ (\~\~text\~\~).
tips.chatTabNotifications: When you are in a chat tab other than 'All', if a new message is sent in the other filtered tab, it will add bolding to the tab label to notify you.
tips.clearChat: When you click the clear chat button at the top right of the chat box, if you are not currently in the 'All' tab, it will only remove messages for the current chat tab you're on.
tips.openSource: YNOproject is open source and the code repositories are available at https://github.com/ynoproject/
